name: Clockwork Tiger
movement: walks at a speed of 40 feet
description: A Large mechanical feline built for combat, it has a solid metallic structure, showcasing agility and power.
memorable: Highly resistant to magical effects, functions as a protective guardian in battles.
goals: Serves as a mechanical guardian for its masters, protecting them from harm.
relations: May be found serving wizards or engineers who create constructs for defense.
environment: Often found in workshops, laboratories, or battlegrounds protecting key locations.
strengths: Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells, and it is immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma limit complex decisions and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack consisting of one bite and two claw strikes, capable of inflicting substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pounce ability allows it to knock foes prone and deal extra damage on a follow-up attack.
additional_information: Immutable Form grants immunity to forms of alteration.
Deflecting Leap offers tactical flexibility in protecting allies.
Can knock enemies prone, setting them up for devastating follow-up attacks.
test_queries: large construct that protects its ward
tactical clockwork tiger with magical resistance
mechanical feline with ability to knock down foes
